title: Firm Retention Summary: Aearo Technologies LLC
text:
FIRM TO BE HIRED: Brown Rudnick LLP

PRINCIPAL ASSIGNED TO THE CASE: Cathrine M. Castaldi

DUTIES: The firm will provide the following services:

•assist, advise, and represent the CAE Committee in contested matters and adversary proceedings as requested by the CAE Committee or its Bankruptcy Co-Counsel, including without limitation at the CAE Committee meetings;

•prepare necessary applications, motions, answers, orders, reports, and other legal papers on behalf of the CAE Committee in contested matters and adversary proceedings, and pursue or participate in contested matters and adversary proceedings as may be necessary or appropriate in furtherance of the CAE Committee's duties, interests, and objectives and as requested by the CAE Committee or its Bankruptcy Co-Counsel;

•represent the CAE Committee at hearings in contested matters and adversary proceedings as requested by the CAE Committee or its Bankruptcy Co-Counsel;

•represent the CAE Committee in connection with any litigation that may arise or be threatened or contemplated in connection with this Case or any related proceedings;

•assist, advise, and represent the CAE Committee in connection with pending, threatened or contemplated litigation regarding any plan of reorganization or liquidation, including review and analysis of any plan of reorganization or liquidation proposed by the Debtors or any other party in interest and any plan proposed by the CAE Committee (including assisting with the formulation and drafting thereof as requested by the CAE Committee or its Bankruptcy Co-Counsel);

•assist, advise, and represent the CAE Committee on issues concerning the appointment of a trustee or examiner under section 1104 of the Bankruptcy Code; and

•provide such other services to the CAE Committee as may be necessary in this Case or any related proceedings as requested by the CAE Committee or its Bankruptcy Co-Counsel.

HOURLY COMPENSATION:

Members of the firm will be compensated at the following hourly rates:

Partners $620 - $2,100

Counsels $480 - $1,450

Associates $420 - $975

Paralegals $395 - $490

CASE BACKGROUND: Aearo Technologies LLC, a unit of 3M Co., filed for chapter 11 bankruptcy protection on July 26.
